heisigStory: And like the Roman numeral III, which triples the numeral I, the kanji for three simply triples the single horizontal stroke. In writing it, think of "1 + 2 = 3" (一 + 二 = 三) in order to keep the middle stroke shorter.
koohiiStory2: THREE measurements define the female shape: BUST, WAIST, and HIPS. Waist is the smallest, and for most women the HIPS are wider than the chest.
readingExamples: 三 (み), 三つ (み.つ), 三つ (みっ.つ)
words: three days, the third day (of the month)
